text: A specialized, timely and accessible approach defines our services: • Structuring of investments with a multi-country approach • Initial diagnosis • Support in capital raising processes • Protection of personal data • Cybersecurity • Intellectual property Mexico is experiencing growing dynamism in the venture capital market. The particularities of this industry require specialized, timely and accessible advice that allows new entrepreneurs to be certain of how they should structure their investments and plan exits in advance. At Muñoz Manzo y Ocampo we have extensive experience in advising these types of ventures, so we can guide them in an agile and accessible way regarding their needs.
